org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.streams.spi

Class Stage.Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.streams.spi.Stage.Filter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stage, Stage.Inlet, Stage.Outlet
    Enclosing interface:
    Stage

    public static final class Stage.Filter
extends Object
implements Stage.Inlet, Stage.Outlet
    A filter stage.

    The given predicate should be invoked on each element consumed. If it returns true, the element should be emitted.

    Any RuntimeException thrown by the predicate should be propagated down the stream as an error.
